meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> hits a <radical>valley</radical>, filling it up with water. Lucky for you, you're a giant, so you just lay down in the valley and use it to <kanji>bathe</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You know what would make the <kanji>bath</kanji>ing experience even better? If you had some egg <reading>yolk</reading>s (よく) to eat. Just crack those yolks into the water you bathe in, and it'll cook to perfection. Yum!
